alert.note: Alert for Custer (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 04 at 7:12PM CDT until June 05 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CUSTER COUNTY... At 712 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Berwyn, or 8 miles southeast of Broken Bow, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ansley and Berwyn. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 87 and 95. Highway 2 between mile markers 282 and 296. Highway 92 between mile markers 300 and 301. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
